purpose: Streamline and automate the software development process by planning projects and generating code task by task.
principle: Integrates with Todoist for project management and uses AI to generate and execute code based on planned tasks.
reusability: Designed to be extensible with plugins for different coding environments and project management tools.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex project structures and integrations.
name: Clean-Coder-AI
description: âœ…2-in-1 AI Developer and Project Manager. AI agents plan an entire project in Todoist and code it task by task.
highlight: Combines AI-driven project planning with automated code generation for seamless software development.
